item.title: NEED HELP PLZ...How Do I Make People Mods Or Admins Using Pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @ownage2 ownage?
item.description:
@ownage2 wrote:

go into “charcter files” click on the username (folder) you want to make “mod” or “admin” press “cltr” + “f” and fine “player rights” and then change it to the folowing

mod = 1 (player rights)
admin = 2 (player rights)
owner = 3 (player rights)

Read full topic
